meanings.definition: A person who lives with another in the same dwelling.
meanings.sent1: My cohabitant and I share a cozy apartment.
meanings.sent2: The cohabitant in the house next door is very friendly.
meanings.sent3: My cohabitant always forgets to take out the trash!
meanings.sent4: The cohabitant in the attic is like a ghost, rarely seen.
meanings.sent5: Having a reliable cohabitant can make daily life easier.

meanings.definition: One of two or more people who share a common living space.
meanings.sent1: The cohabitant in the dorm room is a great cook.
meanings.sent2: She is my cohabitant in this shared apartment.
meanings.sent3: Our cohabitant loves to blast music at odd hours.
meanings.sent4: The cohabitant in the house is like a sibling to me.
meanings.sent5: Finding a trustworthy cohabitant can lead to lasting friendships.
